select count(*) from Freeboard where 1 = 0

or FreeBoard_content like '%${FreeBoard_content}%'

mapper.delete: delete FreeBoard where FreeBoard_boardname = #{FreeBoard_boardname} and FreeBoard_boardno =#{FreeBoard_boardno}

SELECT COUNT(freeLikes_likeno) as cnt FROM freeLikes WHERE freeLikes_boardname = #{freeLikes_boardname} and freeLikes_boardno =#{freeLikes_boardno} and freeLikes_userId=#{freeLikes_userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeLikes VALUES ((SELECT ifnull(MAX(freeLikes_likeno), 0) FROM freeLikes t) +1, #{freeLikes_boardname}, #{freeLikes_boardno}, #{freeLikes_userId}, 0, curdate())
mapper.update: UPDATE freeLikes SET freeLikes_likeCheck = freeLikes_likeCheck + 1 WHERE freeLikes_boardname = #{freeLikes_boardname} and freeLikes_boardno = #{freeLikes_boardno} and freeLikes_userId= #{freeLikes_userId}
